lyrics:
Rachel:
Ohh, how about a round of applause?
Hey, standin' ovation
Ooh, ohh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

You look so dumb right now
Standin' outside my house
Tryin' to apologize
You're so ugly when you cry
Please, just cut it out

And don't tell me you're sorry 'cause you're not
Baby when I know you're only sorry you got caught
But you put on quite a show (oh)
Really had me goin'
Now it's time to go (oh)
Curtain's finally closin'
That was quite a show (oh)
Very entertainin'
But it's over now (but it's over now)
Go on and take a bow, ohhh

Grab your clothes and get gone (get gone, you better hurry up)
You better hurry up before the sprinklers come on (come on)
Talkin' 'bout, "Girl, I love you, you're the one"
This just looks like a re-run
Please, what else is on? (woaah)

And don't tell me you're sorry 'cause you're not (mmm)
Baby when I know you're only sorry you got caught
You put on quite a show (oh)
Really had me goin'
Now it's time to go (oh)
Curtain's finally closin'
That was quite a show (oh)
Very entertainin'
But it's over now (but it's over now)
Go on and take a bow

Ohhh, and the award for the best liar goes to you (goes to you)
For makin' me believe that you could be faithful to me
Let's hear your speech out

(But you put on quite a show, really had me goin')
Now it's time to go (oh)
Curtain's finally closin'
That was quite a show (oh)
Very entertainin'
But it's over now (but it's over now)
Go on and take a bow

But it's over now...
